scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp src/index.html ./build && npm run build:emscripten
scripts.build:emscripten: npm run docker -- emcc src/main.cpp --bind -fwasm-exceptions -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s DEFAULT_LIBRARY_FUNCS_TO_INCLUDE="['$getExceptionMessage', '$incrementExceptionRefcount', '$decrementExceptionRefcount']" -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_main', 'getExceptionMessage', '___get_exception_message','___cpp_exception', '___increment_wasm_exception_refcount', '___decrement_wasm_exception_refcount']" -o ./build/main.js
